definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: In other words, ageing is not only stoppable but also reversible.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說就是衰老不僅可以阻止，而且可以逆轉。

sentences.english: Other studies have suggested that tight control can reverse microalbuminuria.
sentences.chinese: 其他研究都表明了嚴格控制可以逆轉微量尿蛋白。

sentences.english: How can this performance reversal be explained in light of my earlier theoretical discussion?
sentences.chinese: 如何用我前面的理論討論解釋這一性能逆轉呢？

sentences.english: The irrevocable trend of the development of the Chinese characters is simplifying.
sentences.chinese: 簡化是漢字發展不可逆轉的走向。

sentences.english: Diseases can be prevented or reversed by increasing the alkalinity of the terrain
sentences.chinese: 通過增加內環境的鹼性，疾病可以被防止或者逆轉。

sentences.english: But he said erosion of the U.S. manufacturing base 'is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 但他說，美國製造業基礎的侵蝕是不可逆轉的。

sentences.english: And we can go beyond prevention.
sentences.chinese: 除了預防，糖尿病也能逆轉。

sentences.english: Recently there has been a welcome reversal of this trend.
sentences.chinese: 近來，這種趨勢有了一個令人歡迎的逆轉。

sentences.english: Retrotransponson is one of the major parts of rice transposon.
sentences.chinese: 逆轉座子是水稻轉座因子的一個主要組成部分。

sentences.english: Think of efferent coupling as the inverse of afferent coupling.
sentences.chinese: 可以把傳出耦合看作傳入耦合的逆轉。

sentences.english: A ramping up of asset prices to such a degree that a major reversal or crash is expected.
sentences.chinese: 指資產價格狂漲至預期將會大幅逆轉或崩潰的程度。

sentences.english: Quite logically, the marking-up process began to reverse itself.
sentences.chinese: 很自然，這個價格上漲的過程開始逆轉。

sentences.english: The intention of ART is to decrease this viral load.
sentences.chinese: 抗逆轉錄病毒的目的就是降低病毒載量。

sentences.english: Objective To develop effective combination of drug resistance modulators.
sentences.chinese: 目的尋找有效的多藥耐藥聯合逆轉劑。

sentences.english: The lightening and thinning of wool product is an irreversible tendency in wool spinning industry of today.
sentences.chinese: 羊毛產品輕薄化是當今毛紡行業不可逆轉的趨勢。

sentences.english: Lin Dan won the championship in a stunning turnaround.
sentences.chinese: 林丹驚天逆轉奪得冠軍。

definition: to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
lapse/mistake/to make a mistake/fault/service fault (in volleyball, tennis etc)
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
